PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer is readily soluble in common solvents such as chloroform , toluene , THF , and chlorobenzene.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| soluble |
| common solvents |
| chloroform |
| toluene |
| THF |
| chlorobenzene |

The entities identified are "soluble" and several solvent names. "Soluble" is a property name that describes the ability of the polymer to dissolve in the mentioned solvents. The solvent names are also considered property names as they provide information about the specific solvents in which the polymer can be dissolved.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| soluble |

After reevaluating the entities, only "soluble" is considered a clear material property in the context of the paragraph. The other entities are specific solvent names and do not directly refer to a material property.
